Attacks.Name: Poison Jab
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Nidoking gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Earth Power
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stun special condition and enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Megahorn
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character is pushed S before damage is dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Sheer Force
Superpowers.Effect: When making an attack, Nidoking may reroll up to two attack dice. If it does, it cannot trigger special effects on wilds for that attack.

Superpowers.Name: Ground Shaker
Superpowers.Effect: Choose a point within Range 2 of Nidoking. All enemy characters within Range 2 of that point suffer 1 damage and gain the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Toxic Spikes
Superpowers.Effect: Place a Toxic Spike marker within Range 3. If an enemy character ends a movement action within Range 1 of the marker, it gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: All characters, including allies, within Range 2 suffer damage. Wild: Enemy characters gain the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Venom Burst
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Nidoking suffer 1 damage and gain the Poison special condition.
